name: Immune War
description:
A "spin-off" of 2 3 4 players games but can be played online

In this game, you can also choose your own immune cell, each immune cell has a different ability

Note: If you see errors but nothing strange happens, it's not a bug, I just can't stop making it show up

Warning: The rotation of the arrow and shield is sometimes not synced, depending on your computer
